website_summaries.verdict: A very favorably-reviewed choice that combines excellent quality with a large, yet lightweight, frame.
pros: Installs easily with a four-screw hardware mounting kit
A nice large size that is also available in smaller sizes, if you so choose
cons: The two magnets that come with it are too weak
Some buyers report receiving this option damaged

customer_reviews.title: It has taken a beating and still looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to create an interactive surface for my daughter. Mounted it to the wall with double sided tape. Got some wet chalk markers and magnets. She loves it. Will draw and peel the magnets. She has some wood blocks with magnets in them, beats them against the board. It has taken a beating and still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Job

customer_reviews.title: great small board
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for the prize. I have it as an additional board with a larger much more expensive large blackboard. Of course the quality does not reach the professional chool boards but it does work well to sketch some ideas. The board was easy to attach to the wall with the 4 screws given. We will have to see how long it will remain good, but I have the impression already that it will be much longer than white boards which fail usually after a short time. The picture shows the board behind my desk, already in use.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Holds chalk well and very easy to erase
customer_reviews.text: This board is easy to write on and, more importantly for me, easy to erase. Others I tried either didn't take chalk well (lines appeared too thin, for example) or took too much effort and time to erase. I don't want to spend more time erasing than writing! This board is a breeze to erase and the writing is nice and bold. I use regular, old-fashioned chalk.
customer_reviews.author: PhilB

customer_reviews.title: Big, easy to install, and versatile
customer_reviews.text: The board came packaged very well, and with a plastic film covering the chalkboard portion, so it arrived in impeccable shape. The magnetic surface works with no issue, and the frame made it super easy to install on the wall. My toddler loves the board, the chalk goes on great (we bought colored dustless chalk), and comes off super easy with a wet paper towel. My only complaint is how flimsy the chalk tray is (when my toddler accidentally bumps her arm into it, everything goes flying), but I don’t think that flaw is worth knocking down the review a star for it.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item upon receipt but replacement is not
customer_reviews.text: Was wanting this chalkboard for homeschool. Started taking it out from the box and there is a huge deep crease all along the top and middle of right side. Very disappointed! UPDATE: I returned this and had UPS pick it up at my house for free. That was great! Received my replacement board 4 days later and the package was not damaged and the board is perfect! Only thing I will say is that the blackboard is actually like contact paper chalkboard. It is not actually a chalkboard like a heavy made one. It works well so I am happy with that and is nice and big to teach kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Mama5b

customer_reviews.title: Very good blackboard
customer_reviews.text: staying home decided to give my kids more knowledge with areas not covered in their school these days, looking at what they cover is not enough comparing to what they used to teach us in the school, every time i talk to teachers - their answer - we don't have budget for it, what? i only hear how your salaries are keep growing and you retire with 80K a year!!! fine, not my battle - will do it myself at home.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Settler

customer_reviews.title: Chalk stands out
customer_reviews.text: I got this one partially because it was claimed to have the ability to make chalk pop out. Some chalkboards are hard to write on, not this one. Easy peasy. It was easy to mount as well, I'm only giving it 4 stars because the "tray" that holds the chalk on the bottom constantly falls off. This is a great size for myself and my 4 year old. There's enough room for two people or possibly three kids (if they promise to cooperate, of course) to write/draw at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: carlinacarino

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy. Arrived damaged twice !
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a small amount of damage to the cardboard at one corner. Opened it up to find one corner totally smashed. Replacement arrives. No damage to cardboard open package clearly board has been bent or folded. Product is cheap and not sturdy enough to survive shipping. This company need to invest in some packaging materials.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but durable and sturdy. Shipped fast and the packaging was great. No dings or dents or scratches to the blackboard. I purchased liquid chalk for use and it cleans off with ease. I know some blackboards are porous and would absorb the liquid chalk creating permanent markings but this one does not. The chalk holder is a bit flimsy and will fall off easily if moved around or bumped so I don't use it. Otherwise, great product and it is living up to my expectations and worth the money spent!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Neville

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teen artsy daughter to make a vision board with. She's got it all decorated and jeweled up. She LOVES it!!!!!! Made the perfect Christmas gift for a teenager. Gave her stick on jewels, stencils, and DIY magnets for the project and it couldn't have been a better useful craft for a teen girl. Super good board for it. Big enough to decorate and write on. Small enough to find a spot to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly M.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. The only mark against is that the instructions are worthless. Pretty manageable without instructions but there are four small plastic pieces that are supposed to go on the back. It’s not obvious until you’ve already screwed the board to the wall and I wasn’t about to try my luck with the drywall anchors to reinstall. Overall a pretty decent board. We use high quality chalk. Not sure if that makes a difference for one’s impressions of this product.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: We are SO disappointed in this item
customer_reviews.text: We are SO disappointed in this item. After you write on it and try to erase the chalk, all it does is smear. After 24 hours the board looks horrible. We've tried several erasers, a towel, and then broke down and purchase chalk board spray. Nothing has helps and we feel like we threw our money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels like slate, not plastic
customer_reviews.text: My big concern was that I did not want plastic that had been painted with chalkboard paint -- I wanted a proper chalkboard. I don't know what material this is actually made of but it feels great, like a real school chalkboard. Takes chalk very nicely. The chalk holder tray is small, I wish it were the full width of the chalkboard (so it would also catch dust when I erase. Not a dealbreaker.
customer_reviews.author: Sarvi Sheybany

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Very nice old fashion chalk board. I was not expecting the quality of board or frame very nice. The cardboard this chalk board was shipped in is not the standard cheap as can be made cardboard. The outside is clearly marked to handle with care, I am surprised it survived shipping, with the volume of packages I can see this easily being damaged if not destroyed. Yes I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: My board came in damaged !
customer_reviews.text: There is a dent on the left side of the edging/frame and also there is a line on the board itself from something very heavy { perhaps the side of a box?} laid on it and put a crease line in the upper middle top of the board. I just wish things were made like the used to be made. This chalkboard is pretty much crap! I would love to have an old slate board! That's for sure, Nothing comes close to comparing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Gam'ma

customer_reviews.title: great simple board
customer_reviews.text: PROS: - good sturdy board - 2-sided, metal on one side and black on the other - very easy to mount on the wall - comes in a very simple but sturdy cardboard packaging with minimal amount of plastic packaging which is great CONS: haven't found any so far OTHER THOUGHTS: - chalk trey is a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Katya A

customer_reviews.title: Completely happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this board for my homeschooling "classroom". Its such a nice visual aid that allows for artistic creativity. Love the quality, the price, that it came with its own hardware, and that I can use chalkboard paint pens on it. I also love that it comes with a pen tray, which I will be able to use once my kiddos are a bit bigger and less likely to steal my pens. I have no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Baker

customer_reviews.title: Although I like this board
customer_reviews.text: Although I like this board.......first one I got was damaged with a large 12 inch dent in it. The next one I received, the box was damaged in several places. I thought for sure it would be dented also. The frame was dented but kept it anyway for fear the next one would have a dent on the board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dented
customer_reviews.text: It came packaged very well so I was disappointed that there was a sharp dent in the center. I’m applying a vinyl scrabble board printout over this for wall scrabble and unfortunately it will be very noticeable. It is magnetic though and was the size I ordered. FYI, The back side is metal and magnetic too.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: A must if you dislike whiteboards
customer_reviews.text: I can't comment on how good this is compared to an authentic chalkboard, but as far as I can tell, it's working great! Lines come out clear, dotted lines (using the technique found on YouTube) works great, and it's easy to clean! Definitely going to get a second one for more writing space for formulas, sketches, etc..!
customer_reviews.author: J Baker

customer_reviews.title: Inspect it after delivery!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find that it was just the right width for each side to screw into a stud. However, after installing it and removing the plastic, I discovered that there were two creases on one side of the board. My wife said she could barely see them, but they really bother me. However, I didn't want to go through the hassle of returning it, so we just decided to deal with it. Now I'm wishing I had exchanged it for an undamaged one, but it's too late to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Karry J.

customer_reviews.title: I bought the chalk and eraser they recommended to buy with it and when my children used ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the chalk and eraser they recommended to buy with it and when my children used it, it worked wonderful the first time. When they went to erase it to draw again, it wouldn't erase. They had to use a wet washcloth to wipe the board clean. It doesn't get as much use as I thought because of this and I am disappointed with the board because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Rae

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the plastic covering
customer_reviews.text: This board works alright with liquid chalk. Seems to come off easily, although I've only used white, and some reviews say the colored liquid chalk does not come off as easily. We will see. The plastic protective covering did not come off easily at all. Tried peeling slowly at the edges. Was underneath the boarder of the board. Still picking tiny pieces of plastic off. Overall it does what it's intended for. Liquid chalk writes smooth and clearly. The instructions were simple but didn't tell me much more than I assumed. Decent for price.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Crane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and cheap
customer_reviews.text: It has great construction, and it's a big size for the price. Installation was a breeze, and the chalk tray attaches easily (on some boards the chalk tray attachment mechanism is a nightmare, so this was a welcome surprise). My only gripe is that the included magnets are weak to the point of being worthless
customer_reviews.author: casey scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice product in general, bad shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that this would be flimsy but the sandwich of two thin metal sheets with a corrugated center is very firm and strong. The frame is light weight aluminum extrusion and fits snuggly all around. My box arrived and looked like a return. It was all taped up. The frame had four small dents on one side and one in the middle of the board where it looks like the box got tossed around and bumped something hard. The instructions were missing. The dents prevented the tray from sliding on that side.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H Fasse

customer_reviews.title: GRANDSON LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his chalkboard. We put it on the wall in his bedroom and he uses it every time he comes over. It is easy to clean. I also love that it is magnetic. I bought him the magnetic alphabet letters and he plays with them all of the time on the chalkboard. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: grvsfamily

customer_reviews.title: Mommy approved!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this board for home schooling because of the pandemic. It is a nice size and sturdy. It can be carried around the house if you want to teach in different rooms. Just make sure it is in a nice spot where it cannot fall because it will dent. Which is to be expected. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: This is great and perfect for what I needed it for. I hung it above my desk at work. It was the easiest to install with 2 of us, 1 to hold it in place and 1 to drill the holes needed then screw it in. Had it up in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: CHAZELLE R.

customer_reviews.title: Great chalkboard!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, and a great value for the money. I've been using regular chalk sticks, both white and various colors, and they come off easily with a spray bottle of water and microfiber cleaning cloth. I guess there's some very faint ghosting if you're squinting and looking for it, but when cleaned it looks just like a normal blank blackboard. My kids are all obsessed with it; I'm getting a second one for the basement playroom so they stop drawing over my notes. :)
customer_reviews.author: E. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The chalkboard arrived with a big dent. It was not packed well enough to protect it during shipping. We did not want to go through the hassle of returning it since it’s so large. Other than that, it is pretty smooth to write on and erases well with a microfiber eraser. It is also fairly lightweight and easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola M.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived completely bent. It was a gift so I didn't actually open it until today, which happened to be after the return window closed. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Danie A

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this board!
customer_reviews.text: This board is terrific! Bigger than I expected but I find that I'm using every inch of it. Love that I can write on it AND post all my notices and reminders with the magnets. Don't know what I did without it.
customer_reviews.author: sunnydee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chalkboard. purchase it again. In fact, I did.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chalk board. Chalk writes great on it and erases easily leaving no residual marks. Great quality. Perfect size for my lap while sitting on the couch sketching out my ideas. Would purchase it again. In fact, I did.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly as described and worked for my monthly chalkboard design that I wanted to do with my son!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed in condition of product on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it was a quality board, unfortunately arrived with a deep gouge/creece across the writing surface, product it too large to send back from our area and will have to make due as it is needed immediately for online teaching. My suggestion would be add additional protection to the writing side of the board and make sure it is not damaged before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Fosberg

customer_reviews.title: 1st one ordered was damaged, 2nd one is perfect
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is everything it said it would be - for that reason 5 stars. However, the first one I received was damaged, and I had to return it. I'm not sure if this is a packaging problem more than anything, since many other reviews said that theirs was delivered damaged as well. Returning the package was easy, and the second one I received was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Crenshaw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and works with chalk markers
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a great price, AND it works excellently with chalk markers. They wipe off with water (although depending on the brand, they sometimes need a few passes). The magnets aren't strong but I feel like that's par for the course with this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Brosephene_

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a toddler or pre-schooler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a toddler and we really love it. There is lots of room for all his Melissa & Doug wooden magnets and still room to scribble with colored chalk. His dad mounted it on the wall about a foot above the baseboard for now and will raise it as he grows
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS BLESSING AND PRAYER BOARD
customer_reviews.text: Use this board to put prayer request Praise Reports, pictures, my thank you note list, cards that need to be sent, Birthday, Sympathy etc I love this board!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect addition to my toddlers room. It’s sturdy and large. My toddler loves using it daily and it was really easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Torres

customer_reviews.title: White dot in center of board???
customer_reviews.text: There is a white spot in center of chalkboard. Haven’t used it yet. Just took off plastic and noticed this. It appears to be a lack of black color, rather than a bit of white. ???? Can’t review well as I can’t see past the dot
customer_reviews.author: MomCandy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Black Board
customer_reviews.text: Very nice black board. Put on the wall of a small classroom. Kids enjoy drawing with chalk. Erases and cleans up well with wet rag. Light weight.
customer_reviews.author: JFK

customer_reviews.title: used 2 in 2 different applications
customer_reviews.text: super easy to install with a level and a screw gun. sturdy. the pen tray is ok - but could be better attached. cleans easy.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great Black Board!
customer_reviews.text: Very lovely black board. It is a solid piece that I used as a specials board that moves around a lot. Will be ordering another one!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Reichlin

customer_reviews.title: Great chalkboard
customer_reviews.text: I don't have anything to compare it to since this is the first chalkboard I've purchased for my home, but it more than met my expectations. Quality seems great, size is perfect (I got the 36x48), the price is reasonable and the installation was relatively straightforward (you'll need a screwdriver). All in all it does what I'd like it to do and does it as expected. Now to start planning my diabolical takeover of the planet...
customer_reviews.author: David Francis

customer_reviews.title: Replaced easily
customer_reviews.text: Was waiting to receive replacement to return first board ordered that was in awful shape. Wasn't sure if second board would be in any better condition. It just arrived and it is in MUCH better condition so I will now be shipping the first one back. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Great Chalkboard for Home Use
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with this chalkboard. It erases well and there are no problems writing on it (we use regular chalk, not chalk markers). My daughter especially loves the tray that comes with it. It's not a beefy chalkboard like we had in our classrooms in grade school, but for everyday home us this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: rchild

customer_reviews.title: Large Magnet Board
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to cover my fireplace since we are not using it and I wanted my kids to stay out of it. It is perfect! It’s the largest size I could find and my kids love moving magnets around on the chalkboard. I would recommend this item as it’s large enough to even act as a chalkboard if you’re home schooling.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ahn

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I love my chalkboard. This will come in use when school do go back and mines children will be at home schooling so I will be teaching my children at home so we are happy for our puchase. Love that it came with the chalk holder and 2 magnic to hold my paper on the board so yes I love my chalkboard.
customer_reviews.author: Bossychic38

customer_reviews.title: perfect size and my 2
customer_reviews.text: perfect size and my 2, almost 3, year old loves it. Uses any chalk and erases fairly well. His fridge letters stick to it too. I didn't use the screws that came with it but instead velcro'd that sucker to the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, but that's good.
customer_reviews.text: This monster is super heavy, but I guess that means it's sturdy. Survived a festival with no wear and tear, is truly magnetic, and seems liable to last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin W.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, nice but poorly shipped
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged with bents because of poor packaging and transport. The actual board is nice but it was expensive for what It is.
customer_reviews.author: EA739307

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter loves it. Bought colored chalk. When she's not doing school work, she's drawing picture scenes. This is an awesome bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: papayamon

customer_reviews.title: Great chalkboard for home and office use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for Rhythmic Writing with my NILD Educational Therapy student. Great surface, sturdy frame. It's perfect for what I need!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Robert L Grete

customer_reviews.title: Box was good product was damaged instead
customer_reviews.text: box was not damaged but my chalk board was damaged when I opened it it has a dent & a crinkle on it
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Davis

customer_reviews.title: great magnetic board
customer_reviews.text: great magnetic board...i am a collector of magneta when i travel ..and the fridge waa too small ..this worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Ronica Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Nice board.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived damaged with a small dent on the side but I’m kipping it. Kids loved it. We hung it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice looking blackboard
customer_reviews.text: I have the blackboard mounted in my garage to track my workouts. It looks great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Remixedlatino

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love this using for homeschooling great quality old school chalk board feel love it
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Was a birthday gift to my son who loves school. Big enough my two kids shouldn't fight over it. Was easy to hang on the wall. Very sturdy. Erases well. No negatives.
customer_reviews.author: GacktUSA

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item came damaged. The frame was bent and it did not lay flat on the wall. Board was very flimsy. It was like painted cardboard with aluminum foil on the back. I returned it. Would have probably retuned even if it wasn’t damaged.
customer_reviews.author: hegbar

customer_reviews.title: Damaged corner
customer_reviews.text: Great size like that its magnetic an chalk only problem was it came damaged in the box corner was bent.
customer_reviews.author: william t.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works best with small white chalk. If using sidewalk chalk, use white, not colors.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Lunsford

customer_reviews.title: Damaged, looks like it was dropped or something heavy fell on it
customer_reviews.text: It came damaged I have to go through the process of returning it and hope I get a better one mailed next time.
customer_reviews.author: Tina d.

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was quick, board is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Will be using his for homeschooling so size and quality are exactly what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent multifunctional board.
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and wanted a background that could be changed around. This board is perfect; I can put anything magnetic on it, and write on it with chalk. The size is great, and it was super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my office
customer_reviews.text: This board is everything I need for my office. I used liquid chalk marker and left messages on it for over a week and they came off just fine with a damp cloth. It was very simple to put up....I did it alone. Great chalk board and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged, Parts Missing
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy build, but arrived damaged. Dented in two places. Also arrived without the promised magnets and without the screws, etc. needed to bolt it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect. Bigger than i expected but i came in good condition. No cracks no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Malcom Kirksey

customer_reviews.title: Great board
customer_reviews.text: nice board. I like this size too. It's screwed to the wall within arms reach of my sewing table. Makes it easy to post reminders to myself. Get one, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Jarhead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and great size my son loves it and it's very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It was as described
customer_reviews.text: Just as described . Does everything it suppose to do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The chalkboard is big and it was easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: The Board itself was constructed very well however, for the purpose it does not workout. The first time I used it the board does not erase. I can still see the writing and can’t you it anymore honestly. I have used all types of cleaners and I cannot get the chalk off. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Densmore

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I have made two purchases - 1 board at first followed by two more. The quality is great for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: This chalkboard was perfect for our homeschool room. It was easy to level and get screwed on the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great board and well made, I love the look and it fits well in my garage. It works great with white and color classic chalk and erasing is easy. The metal trim gives it a nice professional or industrial look.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M. Missler

customer_reviews.title: Great board for college students.
customer_reviews.text: I would say that in overall the board is quite useful for me because I am a college student that uses it for keeping a schedule and writing down equations or identities to remember for test.it was hard for me to install because I need to screw in the bolts to my wall and I needed an extra person to help me with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony V.

customer_reviews.title: To display a little something from each vacation!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the magnetic chalkboard to display magnets that my husband and I pickup on our family vacations. I love the board for this purpose!
customer_reviews.author: T. DeLoach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works absolutely great for my two year to put her animal farm magnets and write with her chalk.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Del Angel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my little girls room, it's great quality and good size. She uses it for her letter magnets, I haven't ventured into the chalk yet!
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love how big the board is but super disappointed that I have to send it back right away because it arrived damaged. Will order again and hopefully this time it won’t come damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.

customer_reviews.title: Good Board
customer_reviews.text: Good board a little hard to erase but for the price I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob White

customer_reviews.title: A Good One
customer_reviews.text: Boy, I love the feel of this chalkboard. A really good one.
customer_reviews.author: Johnboy, Texas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size however
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size however, it leaves residue from what you wrote the day before but I think all chalk boards do that.
customer_reviews.author: ShortStop757

customer_reviews.title: Great board
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with board. I use it for logging my workouts outside. I only used regular chalk. Not sure if you can use liquid chalk on the board.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It is nice and lightweight but sturdy and very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Great Board
customer_reviews.text: Functional, good size. Kids love it. It was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Coxton

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Chalkboard
customer_reviews.text: The board is bent all the way down the middle, unusable. Need to send back but don’t know who to send it to because it was sourced out.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Goza

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great for a kids room. Easily hung on wall, great value. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Schuster clan

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! I am a teacher and we Made a ...
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! I am a teacher and we Made a classroom for our daughter's bedroom to play, and it is nicer than my real chalkboard at school!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Symber

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome addition to our learning center
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome addition to our learning center! It was easy to install and a great size. Not too small and not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as good as any chalk board and easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: Chalkboard arrived in great condition. I have been using the versachalk markers ...
customer_reviews.text: Chalkboard arrived in great condition. I have been using the versachalk markers and they wipe off easily. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Came with a crease in the middle but otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: I needed it to be perfect so the crease in the chalkboard was a disappointment. It's big so it probably got bent while shipping?? Otherwise it's nice. Magnetic and otherwise well-made. Good for home school, I bet.
customer_reviews.author: pamela oliver munoz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this for teaching and it is the perfect backdrop for my VIP kid classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good blackboard
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I'm a visual thinker/planner. Comes with a chalk tray (I didn't install mine). Solid.Wipes clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: arrived completely broken
customer_reviews.text: i couldn’t even use it because it arrived totally broken. I hope i can get a replacement because it looks like a good chalkboard if it wasn’t broken.
customer_reviews.author: SIV

customer_reviews.title: Good black board
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 5 of these and all have been great but one. This one came with a whole through it :( I put this in my bar so its dark and you can't see it :(
customer_reviews.author: sally puskaric

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item was damaged when received. Corner of board bent inside of package it came in. We had to repair to corner by re-bending it. Thought you should know this and this is the reason for 4 stars. This is why I could not give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: XBoard 48 x 36 Magnetic Chalkboard Black Board, Chalk Board/Blackboard with 2 Magnets
product_meta.description:
XBoard Large Blackboard
The 48 in. x 36 in. Aluminum Framed Chalkboard is ideal for corporate as well as educational institutions. Useful for writing messages, drawing pictures or use the included magnets to hang papers. XBoard chalkboard is crafted with a premium scratch resistant surface and attractive satin anodized aluminum frames to give boards a classic, polished look. XBoard message boards are perfect for use as a restaurant chalkboard, menu board, wedding sign, and much more. Chalkboard can be written on by regular chalks.

Specifications 
Product Type: Chalkboard 
Dimensions: 47.6 x 34.6 inches 
Magnetic: Yes 
Style: Wall-Mounted 
Reversible: No 
Frame Material: Silver anodized aluminum 
Corner Material: Nylon 
Surface Material: Coating Steel

Includes
1 x Magnetic Blackboard
1 x Detachable Chalk tray
1 x Mounting Hardware

Warranty
XBoard Magnetic Wall-mounted Blackboard comes with a two year manufacturer's warranty

Reminder
To protect item and ensure perfect condition at arrival, chalk board is covered by protective plastic film. Before use, tear off the film from the corner.

About XBoard
XBoard is a professional manufacturer of high quality board, produce hundreds of thousands of board products every month, from magnetic whiteboard, melamine whiteboard, blackboard, fabric board, cork board and Easel-Style Dry Erase Boards, etc. Each piece is rigorously tested for durability. Each piece is constructed with uniquely tough materials to reduce the risk of damage during shipping. Xboard keeps bringing best writing experience to customers all over the world!
feature_bullets: Exact size: 47.3" x 35.2". Black contrasting, anti-scratch surface is perfect for drawing, teaching or leaving notes in home, office, dorm with easy visibility
Magnetic Multi-use board duals as a bulletin board by using the 2 attached magnets to pin notes, messages, pictures, memos, calendars and more
Message board conveniently comes with mounting hardware make it easy to fix on wall vertically or horizontally
Crafted from sturdy aluminum frame with tough Nylon corners for durability with no sharp or pointed edges, perfect for kids
The detachable marker tray can be placed on any of the chalkboard's 4 sides, to keep your writing materials close at hand. 2 years warranty against manufacturer's defects
